columns.name: pcd
columns.rdfs:comment: All current (`live`) postcodes within the United Kingdom, the Channel Islands and the Isle of Man, received monthly from Royal Mail. Also, all terminated (`closed`) postcodes that have not been subsequently re-used by Royal Mail within the United Kingdom and by the postal administrations in the Channel Islands and the Isle of Man. 2, 3 or 4 character outward code - left aligned; 3 character inward code - right aligned; 3rd and 4th characters may be blank ()

columns.name: pcd2
columns.rdfs:comment: As above, except: 2, 3 or 4-character outward code - left aligned; 3-character inward code - right aligned; 5th character always blank and 3rd and 4th characters may be blank ()

columns.name: pcds
columns.rdfs:comment: 2, 3 or 4-character outward code; Single space (); 3-character inward code

columns.name: dointr
columns.rdfs:comment: The most recent occurrence of the postcode's date of introduction.

columns.name: doterm
columns.rdfs:comment: If present, the most recent occurrence of the postcode's date of termination, otherwise: null = `live` postcode

columns.name: oa21
columns.rdfs:comment: The 2021 Census OAs in England and Wales are based on 2011 Census OAs, and they form the building bricks for defining higher level geographies. 2021 DZs for NI and 2011 OAs for Scotland are included, along with pseudo codes for Channel Islands and Isle of Man. The field will otherwise be blank for postcodes with no grid reference. E00000001 - E00190594 = England; W00000001 - W00010697 = Wales; S00088956 - S00135306 = Scotland; N20000001 - N20003789 = Northern Ireland; L99999999 (pseudo) = Channel Islands; M99999999 (pseudo) = Isle of Man; null = no information available

columns.name: pcd
columns.rdfs:label: pcd
columns.rdfs:comment: Unit postcode – 7 character version. All current (‘live’) postcodes within the United Kingdom, the Channel Islands and the Isle of Man, received monthly from Royal Mail. Also, all terminated (‘closed’) postcodes that have not been subsequently re-used by Royal Mail within the United Kingdom and by the postal administrations in the Channel Islands and the Isle of Man. 2, 3 or 4 character outward code - left aligned; 3 character inward code - right aligned; 3rd and 4th characters may be blank (_)

columns.name: pcd2
columns.rdfs:label: pcd2
columns.rdfs:comment: Unit postcode – 8 character version.

columns.name: pcds
columns.rdfs:label: pcds
columns.rdfs:comment: Unit postcode - variable length (e-Gif) version.

columns.name: dointr
columns.rdfs:label: dointr
columns.rdfs:comment: Date of introduction.

columns.name: doterm
columns.rdfs:label: doterm
columns.rdfs:comment: Date of termination.

columns.name: usertype
columns.rdfs:label: usertype
columns.rdfs:comment: Postcode user type.

columns.name: oseast1m
columns.rdfs:label: oseast1m
columns.rdfs:comment: National grid reference - Easting.

columns.name: osnrth1m

columns.rdfs:comment: National grid reference - Northing.

columns.name: osgrdind
columns.rdfs:label: osgrdind
columns.rdfs:comment: Grid reference positional quality indicator.

columns.name: oa11

columns.rdfs:comment: 2011 Census Output Area (OA)/ Small Area (SA).

columns.name: cty
columns.rdfs:label: cty
columns.rdfs:comment: County.

columns.name: ced
columns.rdfs:label: ced
columns.rdfs:comment: County Electoral Division.

columns.name: laua
columns.rdfs:label: laua
columns.rdfs:comment: Local Authority District (LAD) - unitary authority (UA)/non-metropolitan district (NMD)/ metropolitan district (MD)/ London borough (LB)/ council area (CA)/district council area (DCA).

columns.name: ward
columns.rdfs:label: ward
columns.rdfs:comment: (Electoral) ward/division.

columns.name: hlthau
columns.rdfs:label: hlthau
columns.rdfs:comment: Former Strategic Health Authority (SHA)/ Local Health Board (LHB)/ Health Board (HB)/ Health Authority (HA)/ Health & Social Care Board (HSCB).

columns.name: nhser
columns.rdfs:label: nhser
columns.rdfs:comment: NHS England (Region) (NHS ER).

columns.name: ctry
columns.rdfs:label: ctry
columns.rdfs:comment: Country.

columns.name: rgn
columns.rdfs:label: rgn
columns.rdfs:comment: Region (former GOR)

columns.name: pcon
columns.rdfs:label: pcon
columns.rdfs:comment: Westminster parliamentary constituency.

columns.name: eer
columns.rdfs:label: eer
columns.rdfs:comment: European Electoral Region (EER).

columns.name: teclec
columns.rdfs:label: teclec
columns.rdfs:comment: Local Learning and Skills Council (LLSC)/ Dept. of Children, Education, Lifelong Learning and Skills (DCELLS)/ Enterprise Region (ER).

columns.name: ttwa
columns.rdfs:label: ttwa
columns.rdfs:comment: Travel to Work Area (TTWA).

columns.name: pct
columns.rdfs:label: pct
columns.rdfs:comment: Primary Care Trust (PCT)/ Care Trust/ Care Trust Plus (CT)/ Local Health Board (LHB)/ Community Health Partnership (CHP)/ Local Commissioning Group (LCG)/ Primary Healthcare Directorate (PHD).

columns.name: nuts
columns.rdfs:label: nuts
columns.rdfs:comment: LAU2 area.

columns.name: park

columns.rdfs:comment: National park.

columns.name: lsoa11

columns.rdfs:comment: 2011 Census Lower Layer Super Output Area (LSOA)/ Data Zone (DZ)/ SOA.

columns.name: msoa11

columns.rdfs:comment: Clinical Commissioning Group (CCG)/ Local Health Board (LHB)/ Community Health Partnership (CHP)/ Local Commissioning Group (LCG)/ Primary Healthcare Directorate (PHD).

columns.rdfs:comment: 2011 Census rural-urban classification.

columns.name: oac11
columns.rdfs:label: oac11
columns.rdfs:comment: 2011 Census rural-urban classification.

columns.name: lat

columns.rdfs:comment: Decimal degrees latitude.

columns.name: lep1

columns.rdfs:comment: Local Enterprise Partnership (LEP) - first instance.

columns.name: GEOGCD
columns.rdfs:label: GEOGCD
columns.rdfs:comment: Nine digit code for the Instance (i.e. E01000001).

columns.name: GEOGNM
columns.rdfs:label: GEOGNM
columns.rdfs:comment: Name of the Instance

columns.name: GEOGNMW
columns.rdfs:label: GEOGNMW
columns.rdfs:comment: Welsh name of the Instance

columns.name: SI_ID
columns.rdfs:label: SI_ID
columns.rdfs:comment: Number of legislation which defines the Instance, if applicable (i.e.  Statutory Instruments)

columns.name: SI_TITLE
columns.rdfs:label: SI_TITLE
columns.rdfs:comment: Name of legislation which defines the Instance, if applicable (i.e. Statutory Instruments)

columns.name: OPER_DATE
columns.rdfs:label: OPER_DATE
columns.rdfs:comment: Date when the Instance came into use (usually the enforcement date of legislation which defines the instance)

columns.name: TERM_DATE
columns.rdfs:label: TERM_DATE
columns.rdfs:comment: Date when the Instance was archived (usually the day before the enforcement date of legislation which defines the new instance)

columns.name: PARENTCD
columns.rdfs:label: PARENTCD
columns.rdfs:comment: Nine digit code of the parent instance in the hierarchy (if there is one).

columns.name: ENTITYCD
columns.rdfs:label: ENTITYCD
columns.rdfs:comment: Three digit code prefix for the Entity (i.e. E01). This field is the code allocated from the Register of Geographic Codes.

columns.name: OWNER
columns.rdfs:label: OWNER
columns.rdfs:comment: Geography owner of the entity

columns.name: STATUS
columns.rdfs:label: STATUS
columns.rdfs:comment: States whether the Instance is live or terminated

columns.name: AREAEHECT
columns.rdfs:label: AREAEHECT
columns.rdfs:comment: 'Extent of the Realm' measurement, in hectares, to 2 decimal places. 'Extent of the Realm' is typically co-incident with Mean Low Water

columns.name: AREACHECT
columns.rdfs:label: AREACHECT
columns.rdfs:comment: Area to Mean High Water, in hectares, to 2 decimal places. Measurements are limited to the Mean High Water mark and include all tracts of inland water

columns.name: AREAIHECT
columns.rdfs:label: AREAIHECT
columns.rdfs:comment: Area of inland water, in hectares, to 2 decimal places. This is the surface area of inland water with a surface area measurement of more than 1km2

columns.name: AREALHECT
columns.rdfs:label: AREALHECT
columns.rdfs:comment: Area to Mean High Water excluding area of inland water (land area), in hectares, to 2 decimal places.

columns.name: GEOGCD
columns.rdfs:label: GEOGCD
columns.rdfs:comment: Nine digit code for the Instance (i.e. E01000001).

columns.name: GEOGNM
columns.rdfs:label: GEOGNM
columns.rdfs:comment: Name of the Instance

columns.name: GEOGNMW
columns.rdfs:label: GEOGNMW
columns.rdfs:comment: Welsh name of the Instance

columns.name: GEOGCD_P
columns.rdfs:label: GEOGCD_P
columns.rdfs:comment: The previous nine digit code before the change.

columns.name: GEOGNM_P
columns.rdfs:label: GEOGNM_P
columns.rdfs:comment: The previous name before the change.

columns.name: GEOGNMW_P
columns.rdfs:label: GEOGNMW_P
columns.rdfs:comment: The previous Welsh name before the change.

columns.name: SI_ID
columns.rdfs:label: SI_ID
columns.rdfs:comment: Number of legislation which defines the Instance, if applicable (i.e.  Statutory Instruments)

columns.name: SI_TITLE
columns.rdfs:label: SI_TITLE
columns.rdfs:comment: Name of legislation which defines the Instance, if applicable (i.e. Statutory Instruments)

columns.name: OPER_DATE
columns.rdfs:label: OPER_DATE
columns.rdfs:comment: Date when the Instance came into use (usually the enforcement date of legislation which defines the instance)

columns.name: ENTITYCD
columns.rdfs:label: ENTITYCD
columns.rdfs:comment: Three digit code prefix for the Entity (i.e. E01). This field is the code allocated from the Register of Geographic Codes.

columns.name: YEAR
columns.rdfs:label: YEAR
columns.rdfs:comment: This field refers to the year of introduction.
